Posts.EditableText: This morning, in trying to download a game of 11Mb, it slowed and stopped around 8Mb. The game was _Guttersnipe: Baleful Backwash_ if that is relevant. Smaller games seemed slower to load than usual but made it okay. Finally succeeded on fourth attempt after waiting an hour.

Hello Davy, i'm trying now and works fine.

I'll try tomorrow morning and I'll be careful if it happens again. Thanks for the warning.
